text: Central Procurement Technical Unit () is a Bangladesh government agency under the Ministry of Planning responsible for managing procurement by government bodies. Md. Ali Noor is the Director General of Central Procurement Technical Unit. ==History== Central Procurement Technical Unit was established in April 2002 by the government of Bangladesh. It was placed under the Implementation Monitoring and Evaluation Division of the Ministry of Planning. ==References== Category:2002 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government agencies of Bangladesh
title: Central Procurement Technical Unit
